item.title: IPBan
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

The command - the other one is way too messy.

else if(command.startsWith("ipban"))
{
            String playerKicked = command.substring(6);
            client p = (client)server.playerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(playerKicked)];
            p.disconnected = true;
            try
            {
                        BufferedWriter outStream = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./data/bannedips.txt", true));
                        outStream.write(p.connectedFrom); outStream.newLine(); outStream.close();
            }
            catch(IOException _ioe) { }
}

The ‘check if IP is banned’ part:

private boolean checkIPBan(String playerIP)
{
            String tempData;
            DataInputStream inStream = new DataInputStream(new FileInputStream("./data/bannedips.txt"));
            while((tempData = inStream.readLine()) != null)
            {
                        if(tempData.equalsIgnoreCase(playerIP)) return true;
            }
            inStream.close();
            return false;
}

Now somewhere in void intialize() call the method I just wrote for you above. Just setup a few if statements, and if the value is true, then the IP is banned and you can do what you want from there. Enjoy.

Read full topic

item.title: IPBan
item.dc:creator: @Camranrev Camranrev
item.description:
@Camranrev wrote:

Okay, well im going to help you best i can here…
In your folder of your server there may be a data folder open it up and theres a BANNEDIPS folder it may have ips or just be blank Well heres how to ban without the command…

Open up charectars
Open up char file you wish to ban
Copy after the text after character-lastconnection
that is there ip address now put that in BANNEDIPS folder.

Hope i helped you helped me with the server thx so much and good luck

item.title: IPBan
item.dc:creator: @bumbumlongtime bumbumlongtime
item.description:
@bumbumlongtime wrote:

[code]if(command.startsWith(“ipban”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
String victim = command.substring(6);
PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim);
if(otherPIndex != -1 && server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex] != null) {
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
appendToBannedIP(p.connectedFrom);
System.out.println(“Admin:”+playerName+" is IPbanning “+victim);
sendMessage(“Player “+victim+” successfully IP banned”);
BufferedWriter bw = null;
try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“data/bannedips.txt”, true));
bw.write(”"+playerName+" IP Banned “+command.substring(6)+”");
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“Error Ip Banning user.”);
}
}
}
}

[/code]
